scripts.say: Another wave of torpedoes incoming, emergency maneuvers!
Ahh... damn, the situation wouldn't be so dire if the Indomitable didn't strike that rock...
Is this the end of the line...? Didn't realize a swarm of aircraft is so hard to deal with.
Haw-haw, these big guns can no longer keep up with the timesâ€¦ I really want to shower the enemy with a volley... but...
My sister ship Hood, I really miss the time when we traveled around the world...
